Blog transfer

09 Mar 2015
Since I'm pretty new to blogging I haven't found the platform yet that I like best. I decided blogger was a little too plain and wordpress had some better layouts but didn't give me enough control, so I've decided to move to jekyll hosting using github pages.

I won't be posting here any longer. Please direct all traffic to zacblanco.github.io.

EDIT:

I just want to add my previous post about an updated site-- well. Now that I'm using Jekyll I won't be able to keep that as the landing page. You can still find it and view-source zacblanco.github.io/s-old/index.html
